name: Fish Training Camp
description:
In Fish Training Camp you get to experience being a bored kid and training your fish to be the best gamer in the world.  Features 3 different endings! 

This is my first game ever! I've made this project as part of the Girl Games Workshop on June 13 of 2018. Girl Games is Goethe Institute's project to support women in the game developing scene.
This was one of the pre-selected games from the workshop, so I'll also be working on the Girl Games Code-a-thon. If you like my game you can continue supporting my work checking out Jogo Joia. 
Thank you and have a nice day!
